DFrame/Center.description: Centers the frame relative to the whole screen and invalidates its layout. This overrides

DFrame/Close.description: Hides or removes the DFrame, and calls

DFrame/GetBackgroundBlur.description: Gets whether the background behind the frame is being blurred.

DFrame/GetDeleteOnClose.description: Determines whether or not the DFrame will be removed when it is closed. This is set with

DFrame/GetDraggable.description: Gets whether or not the frame is draggable by the user.

DFrame/GetIsMenu.description: Gets whether or not the frame is part of a derma menu. This is set with

DFrame/GetMinHeight.description: Gets the minimum height the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

DFrame/GetMinWidth.description: Gets the minimum width the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

DFrame/GetPaintShadow.description: Gets whether or not the shadow effect bordering the DFrame is being drawn.

DFrame/GetScreenLock.description: Gets whether or not the DFrame is restricted to the boundaries of the screen resolution.

DFrame/GetSizable.description: Gets whether or not the DFrame can be resized by the user.

DFrame/IsActive.description: Determines if the frame or one of its children has the screen focus.

DFrame/OnClose.description: Called when the DFrame is closed with

DFrame/SetDeleteOnClose.description: Determines whether or not the DFrame is removed when it is closed with

DFrame/SetDraggable.description: Sets whether the frame should be draggable by the user. The DFrame can only be dragged from its title bar.

DFrame/SetIsMenu.description: Sets whether the frame is part of a derma menu or not.

DFrame/SetMinHeight.description: Sets the minimum height the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

DFrame/SetMinWidth.description: Sets the minimum width the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

DFrame/SetPaintShadow.description: Sets whether or not the shadow effect bordering the DFrame should be drawn.

DFrame/SetScreenLock.description: Sets whether the DFrame is restricted to the boundaries of the screen resolution.

DFrame/SetSizable.description: Sets whether or not the DFrame can be resized by the user.

DFrame/SetTitle.description: Sets the title of the frame.

DFrame/ShowCloseButton.description: Determines whether the DFrame's control box (close, minimise and maximise buttons) is displayed.
